name: Aprilia Cafe 150
short_description: Aprilia Cafe 150 - A 149cc retro-styled cafe racer with modern engineering, offering classic aesthetics with contemporary performance for urban riding.
pros: Comfortable ergonomics for a cafe racer

faqs.question: Is it suitable for tall riders?
faqs.answer: The 800mm seat height accommodates most riders, though the forward-set footpegs may challenge very tall riders.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with front disc and rear drum brakes without ABS.

faqs.question: What's the service interval?
faqs.answer: Recommended service every 4,000 km or 4 months.

faqs.question: Is it good for highway riding?
faqs.answer: Can handle short highway stints but is more suited for urban riding due to its cafe racer ergonomics.

name: Aprilia FX 150
short_description: Aprilia FX 150 - A 149.2cc naked street motorcycle with aggressive styling, lightweight chassis, and peppy performance for urban commuting.

image_urls.alt: Aprilia FX 150 Aprilia Fx 150 Left View Red

faqs.question: Is it suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, its lightweight and manageable power make it an excellent beginner bike.

faqs.question: Does it have electric start?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with both electric and kick start options.

faqs.question: What's the difference from Cafe 150?
faqs.answer: The FX 150 has more upright ergonomics, simpler styling, and is more affordable than the cafe racer version.

faqs.question: Is it good for highway riding?
faqs.answer: Can cruise at 80-90 kmph but is more comfortable for city commuting.

name: Aprilia GPR 150
short_description: Aprilia GPR 150 - A 149cc full-faired sportbike with track-inspired design, aggressive ergonomics, and race-bred performance for enthusiasts.
cons: High seat height may challenge shorter riders

faqs.question: Is it suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: The aggressive ergonomics and high seat height make it challenging for complete beginners.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with dual-channel ABS as standard.

faqs.question: Is it good for track days?
faqs.answer: Yes, its chassis and suspension are track-oriented, making it excellent for circuit riding.

faqs.question: What's the service interval?
faqs.answer: Recommended service every 4,000 km or 4 months, more frequent if used on track.

name: Aprilia SR 125
short_description: Aprilia SR 125 - A 125cc sporty scooter with aggressive Italian styling, peppy performance, and premium features for urban commuting.

faqs.question: Does it have under-seat storage?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers 16L under-seat storage - enough for a half-face helmet.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for highway riding?
faqs.answer: Can handle short highway stints but is more comfortable for city riding.

faqs.question: What's the difference from SR 150?
faqs.answer: The SR 125 has less power, smaller wheels, and fewer premium features than the 150cc version.

faqs.question: Does it have a charging port?
faqs.answer: No, the base SR 125 variant doesn't include a charging port.

name: Aprilia SR 150 Race
short_description: Aprilia SR 150 Race - A 154.8cc performance-oriented scooter with race-inspired styling, sporty ergonomics, and spirited acceleration for urban riding.

image_urls.alt: Aprilia SR 150 Race Showroom View Red
Aprilia SR 150 Race Showroom View White

faqs.question: What's different from standard SR 150?
faqs.answer: The Race version has sportier graphics, slightly more power, and performance-oriented tuning.

faqs.question: Does it have under-seat storage?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers 16L under-seat storage - enough for a half-face helmet.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for tall riders?
faqs.answer: The 790mm seat height accommodates most riders comfortably.

faqs.question: What's the service interval?
faqs.answer: Recommended service every 4,000 km or 4 months.

name: Aprilia SR 150 RACE CARBON ABS
short_description: Aprilia SR 150 RACE CARBON ABS - A premium 154.8cc sport scooter with carbon fiber accents, ABS braking, and track-inspired performance for enthusiasts.

image_urls.alt: Aprilia SR 150 Race ABS Showroom View

cons: Carbon parts may need special care

faqs.question: What carbon fiber parts are included?
faqs.answer: It features carbon fiber front apron, side panels, and mirror caps for premium aesthetics.

faqs.question: Does it have dual-channel ABS?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with single-channel ABS only on the front wheel.

faqs.question: Is it worth the premium over standard SR 150?
faqs.answer: Only for enthusiasts wanting the carbon looks and ABS - performance is similar to Race version.

faqs.question: What's the warranty period?
faqs.answer: Standard warranty is 2 years or 30,000 km, whichever comes first.

name: Aprilia Terra 150
short_description: Aprilia Terra 150 - A 149cc adventure-style motorcycle with long-travel suspension, upright ergonomics, and versatile performance for light off-road exploration.
cons: Tall seat height may challenge shorter riders

faqs.question: Is it suitable for off-road?
faqs.answer: Yes, with its long-travel suspension, high ground clearance, and spoke wheels, it's capable of light off-roading.

faqs.question: Does it have luggage mounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with rear rack mounts for adding panniers or top case.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for tall riders?
faqs.answer: Yes, the 830mm seat height and upright ergonomics accommodate tall riders well.

faqs.question: What's the service interval?
faqs.answer: Recommended service every 4,000 km or 4 months, more frequent if used off-road.

name: Hyosung GV250DRA
short_description: The Hyosung GV250DRA is a stylish 250cc cruiser designed for comfortable rides with V-twin engine, classic cruiser looks, and modern features for urban and highway cruising.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with front and rear disc brakes without ABS.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for long rides?
faqs.answer: Yes, the cruiser stance and V-twin engine make it good for touring.

faqs.question: Is it beginner friendly?
faqs.answer: It may feel heavy for new riders but manageable for cruiser lovers.

faqs.question: What is the fuel efficiency?
faqs.answer: Users report around 30–33 kmpl under mixed riding conditions.

name: Hyosung GV300R
short_description: The Hyosung GV300R is a premium 300cc cruiser with a powerful V-twin engine, modern cruiser styling, and comfortable ergonomics designed for both city and highway rides.
cons: Heavy and bulky for city rides
Average mileage compared to 300cc naked bikes

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: No, front and rear disc brakes are provided without ABS.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for highway cruising?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is designed for long rides and highway stability.

faqs.question: Does it have liquid cooling?
faqs.answer: Yes, the GV300R comes with liquid cooling system.

faqs.question: Is the LED headlight bright enough?
faqs.answer: Yes, users report it provides good visibility at night.

name: Hyosung GV300S
short_description: The Hyosung GV300S is a stylish 300cc bobber-inspired cruiser with a low seat height, V-twin engine, and modern features aimed at riders seeking comfort with classic looks.
cons: Parts may be harder to find

faqs.question: Does the GV300S have ABS?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with disc brakes but without ABS.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for short riders?
faqs.answer: Yes, the low seat height makes it suitable for short riders.

faqs.question: Does it have liquid cooling?
faqs.answer: Yes, liquid cooling ensures better heat management.

faqs.question: Is it good for daily city commuting?
faqs.answer: It may feel heavy for daily city rides but excellent for cruising.

name: Taro GP 1 V4
short_description: The Taro GP 1 is a premium 150cc full-faired sports bike offering aggressive styling, dual-channel ABS, and excellent handling for sport enthusiasts.
build_quality: Sporty and premium build with racing DNA

image_urls.alt: gp Taro Gp1 Left View Black
gp Taro Gp1 Left View Blue
gp Taro Gp1 Left View Red
gp Taro Gp1 Left View White

cons: Parts may be harder to find

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, dual-channel ABS.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for daily use?
faqs.answer: Yes, but ideal for sport riding rather than commuting.

faqs.question: What is the fuel tank range?
faqs.answer: Approx. 450-500 km on full tank.

faqs.question: Can it be used for long tours?
faqs.answer: Yes, but ensure proper posture and breaks.

name: Taro GP 1 V4 Special Edition
short_description: The Taro GP 1 Special Edition features enhanced styling, upgraded suspension, and limited edition graphics for enthusiasts seeking exclusivity.
build_quality: Sporty and premium with special edition graphics and upgraded suspension

image_urls.alt: gp Taro Gp1 Left View Black
gp Taro Gp1 Left View Blue
gp Taro Gp1 Left View Red
gp Taro Gp1 Left View White

pros: Upgraded suspension for better ride comfort
Powerful engine with good top speed
Digital instrument cluster with special edition graphics
cons: Fuel efficiency slightly lower than base model

faqs.question: What makes the Special Edition different?
faqs.answer: Upgraded suspension, exclusive graphics, and slightly improved performance.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, dual-channel ABS is standard.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for long rides?
faqs.answer: Yes, with proper breaks and riding posture.

faqs.question: Can I customize the graphics?
faqs.answer: Limited customization is possible through Taro authorized dealers.

name: Taro GP 1 V3
short_description: The Taro GP 1 V3 offers a more powerful 155cc engine with updated electronics and refined styling, designed for riders seeking enhanced performance and modern features.
build_quality: Refined sporty build with updated electronics and styling

image_urls.alt: gp Taro Gp1 Left View Black
gp Taro Gp1 Left View Blue
gp Taro Gp1 Left View Red
gp Taro Gp1 Left View White

cons: Might be less comfortable for shorter riders

faqs.question: What are the upgrades in V3?
faqs.answer: More powerful engine, updated electronics, and refined styling.

faqs.question: Does it have ABS?
faqs.answer: Yes, dual-channel ABS is standard.

faqs.question: Is quickshifter available?
faqs.answer: No, this model does not have quickshifter.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for city riding?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers a good balance of performance and handling for urban use.

name: Revoo C03
short_description: The Revoo C03 is a stylish and premium electric scooter designed for urban commuting, offering a long range, digital display, and fast charging capability.
build_quality: Premium finish with urban e-mobility focus
pros: Decent top speed for an EV

faqs.question: What is the range of Revoo C03?
faqs.answer: Up to 100 km on a full charge.

faqs.question: Does it support fast charging?
faqs.answer: Yes, it supports fast charging.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for long tours?
faqs.answer: Not ideal; it’s designed for city commuting.

faqs.question: Can it carry two people?
faqs.answer: Yes, comfortably supports two adults.

name: Revoo C00
short_description: The Revoo C00 is a budget-friendly electric scooter with an efficient motor and compact design, perfect for short commutes and eco-conscious riders.

faqs.question: Is this good for city rides?
faqs.answer: Yes, it’s great for short-distance city use.

faqs.question: Does it come with Bluetooth?
faqs.answer: No, this model does not support Bluetooth.

faqs.question: Can I charge it at home?
faqs.answer: Yes, it charges easily from standard sockets.

faqs.question: What is the warranty?
faqs.answer: Check with dealer for latest warranty terms.

name: Revoo A12
short_description: The Revoo A12 is an entry-level electric scooter focused on affordability and basic performance, suitable for students and short-range riders.
pros: Ideal for students and short trips

faqs.question: Is this scooter suitable for long rides?
faqs.answer: No, it’s designed for short trips and basic commuting.

faqs.question: What is the charging time?
faqs.answer: Typically 5-6 hours from standard outlet.

faqs.question: Does it have a digital display?
faqs.answer: Yes, but it’s basic.

faqs.question: How much weight can it carry?
faqs.answer: Up to 150 kg load capacity.

short_description: The Revoo A01 is a budget-friendly electric bike offering essential features for everyday commuting in urban areas with zero fuel cost.
description: Revoo A01 is designed for riders who want reliable, economical transportation with a minimal carbon footprint. The bike offers a sleek, compact body, LED headlamps, a basic digital console, and comfortable ergonomics. With good battery efficiency and user-friendly handling, the A01 is ideal for students and city dwellers.

faqs.question: What is the top speed of Revoo A01?
faqs.answer: The top speed is approximately 60 km/h.

faqs.question: How long does it take to fully charge?
faqs.answer: It takes about 5–6 hours for a full charge.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for long-distance travel?
faqs.answer: It's best suited for short city commutes.

faqs.question: Does it have disc brakes?
faqs.answer: It has a front disc and rear drum brake.

short_description: Revoo A10 is one of the most affordable electric bikes in Bangladesh, built for basic urban commuting with minimal running costs.
description: The Revoo A10 is a no-frills electric scooter with core features for low-cost city transportation. It features a minimal design, easy controls, LED lighting, and moderate battery range. It's ideal for first-time users, students, or budget-conscious riders who want a reliable and eco-friendly daily ride.
cons: Lead-acid battery takes longer to charge

faqs.question: Is Revoo A10 a good option for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, it’s light and easy to ride, ideal for first-time users.

faqs.question: What is the estimated range?
faqs.answer: Approximately 50–60 km per charge.

faqs.question: Does it come with a digital meter?
faqs.answer: No, it uses analog meters.

faqs.question: How much time does it take to charge?
faqs.answer: 6 to 8 hours with standard charger.

short_description: The Revoo C32 is a sleek electric motorcycle offering urban styling and efficient commuting with an eco-friendly footprint.
description: Revoo C32 combines functionality with style, offering a futuristic design and a smooth riding experience. Designed for city mobility, it features an LED lighting system, digital display, and a capable electric motor. It provides excellent battery range and is suitable for regular urban use without fuel expenses.

faqs.question: What is the battery range of the C32?
faqs.answer: Around 70 km per full charge.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for hilly terrain?
faqs.answer: It's best used in flat city roads.

faqs.question: Does it support fast charging?
faqs.answer: No, it uses standard charging only.

faqs.question: What type of brakes are used?
faqs.answer: Disc at front and drum at rear.

name: Revoo E52
short_description: The Revoo E52 is a powerful electric motorcycle offering smooth acceleration, modern design, and eco-friendly urban commuting.
cons: Limited top speed compared to petrol bikes
Weight slightly higher than petrol counterparts

faqs.question: How long does it take to fully charge?
faqs.answer: Charging time is approximately 4-5 hours on a standard home socket.

faqs.question: Is there smartphone connectivity?
faqs.answer: Yes, it supports Bluetooth connectivity with a dedicated app.

faqs.question: What is the warranty period?
faqs.answer: The battery and motor have a 2-year warranty.

faqs.question: Can it be used for highway rides?
faqs.answer: It is suitable for city and suburban rides but limited for long highway travel.

name: Revoo A12-S
short_description: Revoo A12-S is a compact and affordable electric scooter ideal for short city commutes with eco-friendly performance.
cons: Limited features compared to higher models

faqs.question: How far can it go on a single charge?
faqs.answer: It can travel up to 60 km depending on riding conditions.

faqs.question: Does it have under-seat storage?
faqs.answer: Yes, it has limited under-seat storage suitable for small items.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for hilly areas?
faqs.answer: It performs best on flat urban roads; hills may reduce range.

faqs.question: Does it support fast charging?
faqs.answer: No, it uses standard charging which takes about 4 hours.

name: Revoo C32-Y
short_description: The Revoo C32-Y is a stylish and efficient electric motorcycle perfect for eco-conscious urban riders.

faqs.question: Can I track the bike via smartphone?
faqs.answer: Yes, it supports smartphone app for tracking and diagnostics.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for long rides?
faqs.answer: Best suited for short city commutes due to battery range.

faqs.question: What is the warranty period?
faqs.answer: Battery and motor warranty is 2 years.

faqs.question: Does it have LED lights?
faqs.answer: Yes, both headlight and tail light are LED.

name: Akij Durbar
short_description: Akij Durbar is a no-frills 110cc commuter bike designed for rural and urban use, offering basic transportation with reliability and low running costs.

faqs.question: Does Akij Durbar have self-start?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with kick start only.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for highways?
faqs.answer: Best for city/rural roads due to limited top speed.

faqs.question: What is the fuel tank capacity?
faqs.answer: 10 liters with a 1.5L reserve.

name: Akij Bondhu
short_description: Akij Bondhu is an ultra-affordable 100cc motorcycle aimed at budget riders, prioritizing simplicity and low running costs for daily commutes.

faqs.question: Does Bondhu have tubeless tyres?
faqs.answer: No, it uses tubed tyres.

faqs.question: Is it good for hilly areas?
faqs.answer: Limited power for steep inclines; best for flat terrain.

faqs.question: What colors are available?
faqs.answer: Typically red, blue, and black.

name: Akij Durjoy
short_description: Akij Durjoy is a 125cc commuter motorcycle with slightly upgraded power and features compared to Durbar/Bondhu, targeting rural and semi-urban riders.
cons: Tubeless tyres only in top variant

faqs.question: Does Durjoy come with self-start?
faqs.answer: Yes, it includes self-start as standard.

faqs.question: Is the display digital?
faqs.answer: Semi-digital (speedometer is digital, odometer analog).

faqs.question: Does it have alloy wheels?
faqs.answer: Optional; base variant has spoke wheels.

name: Akij Duranto
short_description: Akij Duranto is a reliable 110cc commuter motorcycle offering a balance of fuel efficiency and performance for daily commuting needs.

faqs.question: Does Akij Duranto have self-start?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with kick start only.

faqs.question: What is the fuel tank capacity?
faqs.answer: 10.5 liters with a 1.8L reserve.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for long rides?
faqs.answer: Best suited for city commuting due to limited power.

name: Akij Duranto V6
short_description: Akij Duranto V6 is an upgraded version with a 125cc engine, offering better performance and slightly more premium features than the standard Duranto.
pros: Front disc brake for improved safety

faqs.question: Does Duranto V6 have self-start?
faqs.answer: Yes, it comes with self-start as standard.

faqs.question: What is the main difference from standard Duranto?
faqs.answer: Larger 125cc engine, front disc brake, and alloy wheels.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for highway riding?
faqs.answer: Better than standard Duranto but still limited for long highway use.

name: Akij Ponkhiraj
short_description: Akij Ponkhiraj is an ultra-affordable 100cc commuter bike designed for budget-conscious riders, offering exceptional fuel efficiency and basic transportation needs.

image_urls.alt: Akij Ponkhiraj Akij Ponkhirag Showroom View

faqs.question: Does Ponkhiraj have electric start?
faqs.answer: No, it only has kick start.

faqs.question: What is the actual mileage?
faqs.answer: Users report 65-68 kmpl in city conditions.

faqs.question: Is it good for hilly areas?
faqs.answer: Not ideal due to limited power; best for flat terrain.

name: Akij Romeo
short_description: Akij Romeo is a stylish 110cc commuter motorcycle with slightly premium looks compared to other Akij bikes, offering decent performance for city commuting.
pros: Better styling than other Akij bikes

faqs.question: Does Romeo have self-start?
faqs.answer: No, it comes with kick start only.

faqs.question: What colors are available?
faqs.answer: Typically red, black and blue variants.

faqs.question: Is it good for highway use?
faqs.answer: Not recommended due to limited power and top speed.
